ABOUT ME

Hey beautiful person, my name is Toby and welcome to my website portfolio. I've always been wildely curious about the world around me since I was a child which is a great assist in my chosen career path. Computer Science is a constantly advancing and expanding field so keeping up with the latest technologies is a must. I'm always excited to learn about new technologies and I love jumping into tough tasks head-on. I don't care if the project is something small or something wouldn't show anyone else. I believe that if you enjoy yourself and learn something new along the way, it's absolutely fine, and I think more people need to understand that. Throughout this site, you can learn more about me, my capabilities, and the projects I've taken part of. I hope you enjoy!

MY PROJECTS

** Project cards are still in working stage. Check back soon for updates! Thank you for your patience. **
Find Your Beat
Music Discovery App (Python) | Jan 2019 - June 2019

Python desktop application for finding music. Provides organic solutions to find recommendations that fit the user's tastes. New titles are crowd-sourced hourly with billions of results to work with.

CalorEZ
Fitness Android App (Android, Java, SQLite) | Aug 2018 - June 2019

Android Application to help users count calories and various other methods reach their fitness goals. Suited for any person whether their aim is to lose fat, gain muscle, or live a healthier lifestyle.
UTD Parking
Campus Parking Alexa Skill (AWS, Python)

Alexa Skill to help students and faculty find parking spaces on campus in real-time. Data regarding campus parking spots are agreggated from parking sensors provided by the campus.
Hey Temoc!
UTD Questions Alexa Skill (AWS, Python)

Alexa Skill that provides users answers with answers to over 500+ questions regarding UTD policies and information. Data is scraped from UTD's FAQ online database.
HearthBot
Hearthstone Game Script (AutoHotKey)

Script for the popular online card arena, Hearthstone, with over 100 million players. The script allows the user to complete rigorous daily quests with the use of color recognition systems along with precise and accurate coordinate timing.
ThreeIdiots
Campus Parking Alexa Skill (Android, Java) | July 2017

Android Application that keeps score of the popular Chinese card game, Landlord (斗地主).
